definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Yuan2 zi3 Ke1 xue2 jia1 Tong1 bao4
ji4 suan4 ji1 ke1 xue2 jia1

sentences.english: Scientists don't yet know what the effects of those reactions might be.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們還不清楚這些反應會具體產生什麼樣的結果。

sentences.english: Scientists find that hard-working people live longer than average men and women.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們發現努力工作的人比一般的人更有生活。

sentences.english: Scientists conducted genetic tests on thousands of maize seed and leaf samples.
sentences.chinese: 科學家對數千份千玉米種子和葉的樣本進行遺傳測試。

sentences.english: Or have scientists been sexing up the risks and playing down the uncertainties?
sentences.chinese: 或者科學家對風險添油加醋，而貶低了不確定性？

sentences.english: Dr. Chen is a leading scientist in ecology.
sentences.chinese: 陳博士是生態學上首屈一指的科學家。

sentences.english: The scientists took tissues from fetal liver, and lymph glands .
sentences.chinese: 科學家從胎兒肝和淋巴腺獲得組織。

sentences.english: One of the most common problems for scientists was money.
sentences.chinese: 科學家面臨的最常見問題之一就是金錢。

sentences.english: Have you heard of rocket scientist Sun Jiadong?
sentences.chinese: 你聽說過火箭科學家孫家棟嗎？

sentences.english: The scientists considered putting a small mechanical mixer in the storage tank.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們考慮在儲存罐裏放進小型機械攪拌機。

sentences.english: I want to be a great scientist like Yuan Longping.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲像袁隆平那樣偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: We rank Li Siguang as a great scientist.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲李四光是個偉大的科學家。

sentences.english: Scientists have a negative attitude to the theory.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們對這個理論的態度是相當消極的。

sentences.english: Scientists believe it is a main source of the G ring and its single ring arc.
sentences.chinese: 科學家認爲，它是一個主要來源國和它的單環環弧。
左撇子科學家其實並不少見。

sentences.english: This investigation leads them to meet the famed scientist Jenna Zan Arbor.
sentences.chinese: 調查過程中他們遇到了著名科學家簡娜瓚阿博。

sentences.english: Other scientists also have worked with low- phytate feed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，其他科學家也進行了低植酸鹽飼料的研究。

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
